howItWorks.title: Here’s How It Works
howItWorks.step1_text: Your client uploads an ID. Raven checks the doc, cross-references global databases, and verifies it — in seconds. No waiting. No guessing. No delays.
howItWorks.step2_title: Spot the Risk, and See the Why
howItWorks.step2_text: Raven doesn’t just scream “ALERT.” It tells you why. With context, evidence, and explainable AI. No black boxes. Just clarity.
howItWorks.step3_text: Every file. Every note. Every flag. All in one secure view your whole team can access. Need an audit trail? It’s already done.

testimonials.heading: Built for People Who Actually Do the Work
testimonials.card1_text: We used to juggle 4 tools. Raven replaced all of them. We onboard clients 2× faster. And compliance? Rock solid.
testimonials.card2_text: “We don’t worry about KYC anymore, Raven does it for us.” From ID checks to sanctions lists, it’s all automatic. Our team saves hours every week, and we know every client is screened thoroughly. Raven is like adding an entire compliance team overnight.
testimonials.card3_text: “Explainable AI changed everything for us.” With Raven, we see exactly why a client is flagged—with clear evidence. It’s not just an alert—it’s insight. Our decisions are faster and smarter, and our auditors love the clean trail.

cta.title: Ready to Stop Babysitting Your KYC Process?

The one your team logs into, and never wants to log out of.
Because it finally makes KYC… make sense.
